pkgmetadata.longdescription: API Wrapper for the UK REF 2014 Impact Case Studies Database // Provides wrapper functions around the UK Research Excellence Framework 2014 Impact Case Studies Database API http://impact.ref.ac.uk/. The database contains relevant publication and research metadata about each case study as well as several paragraphs of text from the case study submissions. Case studies in the database are licenced under a CC-BY 4.0 licence http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/legalcode.
